task.title: Configuring an Instance Termination Policy
task.shortdesc: You can control how Auto Scaling determines which instances to terminate. You can specify a termination policy when you create an Auto Scaling group, and you can change the termination policy at any time using the euscale-update-auto-scaling-group command.

context.p: You can override the default instance termination policy for your Auto Scaling group with one of the following options:

row.entry: The oldest instance in the Auto Scaling group should be terminated.
The newest instance in the Auto Scaling group should be terminated.
The first instance created using the oldest launch configuration should be terminated.
Use the default instance termination policy.
